title: Power Bank

title: Setup
content: Setup #    start application  Setup VR Glasses Wireless or Setup VR Glasses Wired  Setup Tracker

title: Setup Tracker
content:
Setup Tracker #  1. Connect the tracker cables to the pc #  For this step there should be a usb - hub in the box or already on the pc. This usb hub has 4 USB ports. Use those to connect the tracker cables ( long usb c).
2. Connect the cables to the dock or the tracker for charging #  2.1 Connect the cables to the dock #  This should be done when the trackers are in use. This way the trackers are connected wireless to the pc.
 2.2 Connect the cables to the tracker for charging #  This should be done when the trackers are not in use and need charge.

title: Setup VR Glasses Wired
content:
Setup VR Glasses Wired #  1. Connect the Vive Box to the pc #  The vive box has one port at the front and 3 ports at the back. At the back connect the DCIN into a wall outlet, the usb port to a free usb port of the pc and the hdmi caable to the graphics card of the pc.
2. Connect the Vive #  Use the vive video cable to connect the glasses to the vive box. This is the port on the front.

title: Setup VR Glasses Wireless
content:
Setup VR Glasses Wireless #  1. Set up the wireless linkbox #  Find the wireless linkbox and connect the cable to the wireless card. Then place it on the screen.
2. Mount the wireless module #  Find the wireless module and mount it on the vive headset.
3.Connect the wireless module to the htc vive #  Connect the small vive video cable to the vive headset. This can be difficult. You can find a button on the bottom of the headset to get the front and the back part a little apart. This will make a bigger gap to plug the cable in.
 4. Connect the wireless module to power #  Get the power bank, a usb a cable. Then connect the usb cable to the power bank.
5. Start the wireless application #  Once everything is done start the htc wireless application. You may need to restart steam vr.
 Note #  This makes the vive box unnecessary.

title: Start Application
content:
Starting the application #  Requisitions #   Unity Hub Unity 2020.3.14f1 Steam Steam VR  Preferred Way #  Open steam and run the beam vr game. If Steam Vr is not starting up, start it up manually. For starting steam vr look into SteamVR.
Build it yourself #  If the Application executable is not available you can build and run it yourself. Start Unity Hub and you should find the project BeamVR under the projects in the menu.
 Once the unity editor is open you can build the application under edit > Build And Run.
 It will ask you the location you want ot put the executable into and will build the application into this directory and run it.
Not ideal way #  If something is really not working you can just start it through the editor. This should only be required when you are debugging a problem.

title: SteamVR
content: Starting steam vr #  You can start steam vr manually if it wont start for some reason. Start up steam and click the VR icon in the top right corner.
